meanings.definition: Disagreements or differences of opinion among a group of people.
meanings.sent1: The dissensuses among the students led to a heated debate in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The dissensuses between the team members were resolved through open communication.
meanings.sent3: The dissensuses over which movie to watch resulted in a compromise to play a game instead.
meanings.sent4: The dissensuses in the family were like storm clouds gathering before a big argument.
meanings.sent5: The dissensuses in the community meeting were so loud, it felt like a thunderstorm of opinions.

meanings.definition: The act of holding or expressing differing opinions or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: Her dissensuses on the matter were clear when she spoke up against the decision.
meanings.sent2: The dissensuses expressed by the group highlighted the need for open dialogue.
meanings.sent3: His dissensuses on pineapple pizza always made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The dissensuses in the office were like colorful balloons popping up in every conversation.
meanings.sent5: The dissensuses in the classroom were as vibrant as a rainbow of ideas.
